a.p: Visit our athletics department for the latest news and pictures from our teams. You can also get information about attending games with schedules, ticket information, and maps to our facilities.

div.div: Bolivar Schools is doing all that we can to keep our students safe and healthy each day. Learn more about the coronavirus here...

a.title: Bolivar High School to join Ozark Conference

img.alt: Bolivar High School to join Ozark Conference

div.div: Bolivar High School to join Ozark Conference
We are excited to announce that Bolivar High School has been approved for full membership in the Ozark Conference for the 2021-2022 school year.

div.span: Read More About Bolivar High School to join Ozark Conference

div.div: Click here to view information on both Preschool and Kindergarten Registration for the 2020-21 school year.

div.span: Read More About Preschool & Kindergarten Registration 2020-21

div.div:
With commitment, confidence and care for all, we will partner with students, families and the community to foster a safe learning environment that develops future-ready leaders and life-long learners.
BOLIVAR R-1 SCHOOLS MISSION
